title: The Leadville Trail 100 MTB: Gravel vs MTB choice and how I got the bug
content:
Sometimes you just need a break from an event, but I think I'll try Leadville on a gravel bike soon. However I wouldn't recommend it.

Read the full article at The Leadville Trail 100 MTB: Gravel vs MTB choice and how I got the bug on Velo.
author: Troy Templin
